ModMetaData.name: Exempted Stockpiles - DEV
ModMetaData.author: L0laapk3
ModMetaData.description: Adds an option for stockpiles to not count them towards bill output limits. (This is the dev version of NoCraftingFromDumpingStockpiles. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
